title: Next Word Prediction LSTM
description: LSTM-based neural network trained on Sherlock Holmes text to predict next words in sequences. Achieved 87.54% accuracy with TensorFlow/Keras.

title: Climate Risk Modeling
description: Credit risk prediction model integrating climate factors with borrower financial data. Built with Square Management Consulting using Random Forest.

title: CAPM Estimation and Analysis
description: Capital Asset Pricing Model analysis of major NASDAQ stocks (AAPL, MSFT, AMZN, GOOGL, META) using Yahoo Finance data and statistical modeling.

title: End to End Chatbot
description: Intelligent chatbot with intent classification using Logistic Regression and TF-IDF vectorization, deployed with Streamlit web interface.
